A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really wanted to like this movie and look past it's flaws\, but I couldn't. This is the first Star Wars film I've seen that doesn't feel like Star Wars. And no\, I'm not saying it should've been like Empire Strikes Back. I'm saying this could've been a different take on Star Wars without making such drastic changes from the lore and story that's already been built up. I was very disappointed. This movie literally killed my expectations for Episode 9. Hopefully Lucasfilm will see their mistakes and fix it. Hopefully they see how much this movie upset Star Wars fans. But then again\, they've gotten their money. All they see right now is dollar signs.
